settings.promo_subtext: Use the code below and save instantly at checkout.

settings.description_content: Describe your hero product highlights, materials, and key benefits in a couple of punchy sentences.

settings.title: Trusted by Thousands
settings.subtitle: Hear what our community and the press have to say.

settings.quote: A game-changer in open-ear audio technology. The OWS Pro delivers exceptional sound without compromising situational awareness.
settings.author: Tech Editor, TechCrunch

settings.quote: Perfect for athletes and commuters alike. The innovative design keeps you connected to your surroundings while enjoying premium audio.
settings.author: Audio Reviewer, WIRED

settings.quote: Oladance redefines what wireless earbuds can be. Comfort meets cutting-edge technology in the most elegant way.
settings.author: Tech Columnist, Forbes

settings.name: Sarah M.
settings.review_text: Best earbuds for running! I can finally enjoy my music while staying aware of traffic. The bass is surprisingly powerful for open-ear design.

settings.name: James Chen
settings.review_text: All-day comfort without ear fatigue. Perfect for long work calls and commuting. The battery life is exactly as advertised.

settings.name: Emily Lopez
settings.review_text: Incredible sound quality and they stay put during my workouts. A bit pricey, but worth every penny for the quality and comfort.

settings.title: Design & Fit
settings.content: <dl class='grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-x-8 gap-y-4'><dt class='font-medium'>Type</dt><dd>Open Ear</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Earphone Materials</dt><dd>Skin-friendly silicone, titanium memory steel wire</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Charging Case Materials</dt><dd>PC+ABS plastic alloy</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Single Earphone Weight</dt><dd>13.8g</dd></dl>

settings.title: Audio
settings.content: <dl class='grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-x-8 gap-y-4'><dt class='font-medium'>Speaker Size</dt><dd>23mm x 10mm</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Frequency Response</dt><dd>20-20000Hz</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Sound Pressure Level</dt><dd>112dB</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Bluetooth Protocol</dt><dd>SBC</dd></dl>

settings.title: Battery
settings.content: <dl class='grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-x-8 gap-y-4'><dt class='font-medium'>Single Earphone Life</dt><dd>16 Hours</dd><dt class='font-medium'>With Charging Case</dt><dd>58 Hours</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Earphone Charge Time</dt><dd>2 Hours</dd><dt class='font-medium'>Battery Technology</dt><dd>Self-developed 150mAh 'Little Steel Cannon'</dd></dl>
